json_to_edit.voice_over: The ocean's mysteries couldn't contain Coral's curiosity any longer.
json_to_edit.description: Coral, a mermaid, ventures onto land for the first time.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Waves lapping, seagulls, distant ship bells
json_to_edit.name: Ocean Discovery
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A mermaid's first adventure on land, meeting new friends and experiencing the world above.

qa.action: Coral emerges from the ocean onto a beautiful, secluded beach cove at sunset.

hf.action: Coral's eyes widen in wonder as she takes in her first breath of air.

tr.action: Coral awkwardly attempts to move on the sand, with Bubbles flopping beside her.

xc.action: Captain Redbeard approaches from his docked ship, spotting the strange new visitors.

ka.action: Sandy, the beach dog, curiously sniffs at Coral's tail.

fn.action: Coral, Captain Redbeard, Sandy, and Bubbles (in a water bucket) share a moment of joy and discovery.

af.action: As the sun sets, Coral sits on a rock, surrounded by her new friends, gazing at the world she's just discovered.

edit_command: Remove every second shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we will remove every second shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots with keys "hf", "xc", and "fn", leaving shots "qa", "tr", "ka", and "af". we'll update the list_display_order accordingly and adjust the number_of_shots from 7 to 4. all other information in the json will remain the same.
